reviewText: this DVD is better than the more expensive "hot girls of latin america" DVD.  for one, the babes here are hotter and more daring.  the only drawback is that this video does not really contain 80 girls from around the world. it mainly concentrated on limited countries  like copenhagen, finland, holland, england, new york, brazil and mexico. what about those oriental and asian babes?  i guess these are the only countries willing to go really bold.  inspite of that, this DVD is worth its price.
Not worth the money. Around the world in ten babes would be more like it.
Just a dog at heart, I'll never tire of beautiful women. And this has got a lot of them. Thumbs..... UP!

This is one of the cheesier offerings from Playboy, presented in a "day-the-life" style. The thing is, I've seen this done really effectively--some of the early Mystique DVD releases for example. But in this case it's so hokey and contrived that you'll find yourself fast-forwarding to the gratuitous shower scenes, of which there are many.

There are a lot of good-looking women here, some of them exceptional but most of them pretty average for this kind of fare. There are 18 models in two different segments. The DVD run time  is lengthy. Only one of them is a real turn-off and that's this bulimic-looking Mexican girl.

If you're hoping for explicit nudity you'll be disappointed in this. There is some, but it is pretty fleeting. There are a couple of exceptions--seems that the Swedish and Dutch don't mind showing more.

So actually, this is an OK release and really rates more like three and a half stars. Not really worth buying at a premium price.

BTW, "Around the World" is a bit of a misnomer also...nearly all of the stop-offs are in Brazil, New York City, London and Stockholm.
